00011 namespace histmgr {

00013 #ifdef HAVE_ROOT
00014   HistogramOutput __histogramOutput;

00017   HistogramOutput::HistogramOutput()
00018    :  Processor("HistogramOutput")
00019 #ifdef HAVE_PLOTMM
00020       ,_display(0)
00021 #endif
00022 
00023   {
00024     StringVec fileFolderAssignment ;
00025     fileFolderAssignment.push_back("groupName");
00026     fileFolderAssignment.push_back("folderName");
00027     fileFolderAssignment.push_back("fileName.root");
00028     
00029     registerOptionalParameter( "HistogramFileName" , 
00030                                "assign file and folder names to histogram groups" ,
00031                                _fileFolderAssignment ,
00032                                fileFolderAssignment ,
00033                                fileFolderAssignment.size() ) ;
00034 
00035 #ifdef HAVE_PLOTMM
00036     _visualise=0;
00037     registerProcessorParameter( "Visualisation" , 
00038                                 "Visualise the histograms." ,
00039                                 _visualise ,
00040                                 _visualise);
00041 #endif
00042 
00043   }
00044 
00045   HistogramOutput::~HistogramOutput()
00046   {
00047 #ifdef HAVE_PLOTMM
00048     if (_display) {
00049       GLVIEW::GuiThread *gui=GLVIEW::GuiThread::getInstance();
00050       Display *display_ptr=static_cast<Display *>(_display);
00051       gui->removeDisplay(&display_ptr);
00052     }
00053 #endif
00054   }
00055 
00056 
00057   void HistogramOutput::init()
00058   {
00059     printParameters();
00060 
00061     HistMgr *histograms=HistMgr::getInstance();
00062     UInt_t index=0;
00063 
00064     if ( _fileFolderAssignment.size()%3 != 0) {
00065       throw std::runtime_error("HistogramOutput::init> The parameter HistogramFileName must contain for each histogram group exactly 3 values: \
00066 the histogram group name, the assigned output file name, the output folder name or \"\".");
00067     }
00068 
00069 
00070     while( index < _fileFolderAssignment.size() ){
00071 
00072       // histogram group name
00073       // file name
00074       // folder name inside the root file;
00075       if ( _fileFolderAssignment[index].empty() || _fileFolderAssignment[index+1].empty() ) {
00076         throw std::runtime_error("HistogramOutput::init> The histogram group name and the assigned file name specified by the parameter HistogramFileName must not be empty.");      }
00077 
00078       std::string folder_name(_fileFolderAssignment[index+2]);
00079       if (folder_name.size()>0 && folder_name[0]=='\"' && folder_name[folder_name.size()-1]) {
00080         folder_name.erase(0,1);
00081         folder_name.erase(folder_name.size()-1);
00082       }
00083           
00084       std::cout << "HistogramOutput::init> assign group " << _fileFolderAssignment[index] << " to file " << _fileFolderAssignment[index+1] 
00085            << " and write into the folder" << folder_name << std::endl;
00086 
00087       histograms->assignFileName(_fileFolderAssignment[index],_fileFolderAssignment[index+1],folder_name);
00088       index+=3;
00089     }
00090 
00091     histograms->warnOnUnassigned();
00092     histograms->listRegisteredGroups();
00093 
00094 #ifdef HAVE_PLOTMM
00095     // these two objects must stay alive until the GUI thread has created the display
00096     Display *display_ptr=0;
00097     HistogramDisplayKit display_kit;
00098     GLVIEW::GuiThread *gui=0;
00099     if (_visualise>0) {
00100       gui=GLVIEW::GuiThread::getInstance();
00101       gui->registerDisplay(&display_ptr,&display_kit,"Histograms");
00102       // until the display is created we can do some other stuff.
00103 
00104       gui->waitForDisplay(&display_ptr);
00105       _display=dynamic_cast<HistogramDisplay *>(display_ptr);
00106       if (!_display) {
00107         throw std::runtime_error("HistogramOutput::Init> ERROR: Histogram display creation failed!");
00108       }
00109     }
00110     else {
00111       _display=0;
00112     }
00113 #endif
00114 
00115   }
00116 
00117   void HistogramOutput::end()
00118   {
00119 
00120 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
00121     if (_display) {
00122       // wait for the gui to be stopped
00123       GLVIEW::GuiThread *gui=GLVIEW::GuiThread::getInstance();
00124       Display *ptr=static_cast<Display *>(_display);
00125       gui->removeDisplay(&ptr);
00126     }
00127 #endif
00128 
00129     HistMgr *histograms=HistMgr::getInstance();
00130     std::cout << " --- " << name() << " Report :" << std::endl;
00131     histograms->listRegisteredGroups();
00132 #ifdef HAVE_ROOT
00133     histograms->writeHistograms();
00134 #endif
00135     HistMgr::deleteInstance();
00136     std::cout << std::endl;
00137   }
00138 }
